SELECT RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE, RSCOUT.PROCESS_PERFOM_NO, RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_LOT_NO, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_VOL, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CLS,
RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_OUT RSCOUT LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSCCODE ON RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE = RSCCODE.RSC_CD_CODE
WHERE RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CLS = 1
AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE = '%'||#{rscOutCode}||'%'
AND RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE = #{rscCdCode}
AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE >= #{rscOutSDate} AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE <= #{rscOutEDate}
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE, NVL(RSCOUT.VEND_CD_CODE,''), RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_LOT_NO, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_VOL, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CLS, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_RESN,
RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME,
VEND.VEND_CD_NM,
EMP.EMP_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_OUT RSCOUT LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSCCODE ON RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE = RSCCODE.RSC_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON RSCOUT.VEND_CD_CODE = VEND.VEND_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON RSCOUT.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
WHERE RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CLS = 2
AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{rscOutCode}||'%'
AND RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE = #{rscCdCode}
AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE >= #{rscOutSDate} AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE <= #{rscOutEDate}
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE, RSCOUT.VEND_CD_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_LOT_NO, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_VOL, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CLS, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_RESN,
RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME,
VEND.VEND_CD_NM,
EMP.EMP_ID,
STOCK.RSC_STOCK
FROM BF_RSC_OUT RSCOUT LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSCCODE ON RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE = RSCCODE.RSC_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON RSCOUT.VEND_CD_CODE = VEND.VEND_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON RSCOUT.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN BF_RSC_STOCK STOCK ON RSCOUT.RSC_LOT_NO = STOCK.RSC_LOT_NO
WHERE RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CLS = 2 AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE = #{rscOutCode}
